SEARCH

Package src2.database

package src2.database
Provides classes and interfaces for managing database operations within the Hospital Management System. This includes csv files which store data and data access objects (DAOs) for handling persistence of users, appointments, schedules, and inventory.

Each DAO class within this package provides methods to perform create, read, update and delete (CRUD) operations on specific data entities, which is then stored in the corresponding csv files.

Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    src2
    This is the main entry point for the application.
    src2.controller
    Provides the classes and methods responsible for managing the various operations in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    src2.helper
    Provides utility classes and methods for the Hospital Management System (HMS), including input handling, password encryption and CSV data parsing.
    src2.model
    Contains the classes representing the core data models used in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    src2.using
    Contains utility classes, enums, and constants used across the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    src2.view
    Contains the classes and interfaces responsible for the user interface layer of the Hospital Management System.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppointmentDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) responsible for managing appointment data.
    DataBase
    Represents a database manager that handles the interaction with various DAO (Data Access Object) components, such as user, medicine, schedule, and appointment data.
    MedicineDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing medicine data.
    ScheduleDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing doctor schedules.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing user data, including patients and staff.
